section.name: Tips

entry.string: To correct reading errors while ripping you can enable Jitter correction in the Ripper tab of %1's configuration dialog. If that does not help, try using one of the Paranoia modes.

section.entry: To correct reading errors while ripping you can enable Jitter correction in the Ripper tab of %1's configuration dialogue. If that does not help, try using one of the Paranoia modes.

section.name: Errors

entry.string: CDDB support is disabled! Please enable local or remote CDDB support in the configuration dialog.

section.entry: CDDB support is disabled! Please enable local or remote CDDB support in the configuration dialogue.

entry.string: Remote CDDB support is disabled! Please enable remote CDDB support in the configuration dialog.

section.entry: Remote CDDB support is disabled! Please enable remote CDDB support in the configuration dialogue.

section.name: Donate

entry.string: Please write to %1 if you would like to mail a check or send money by mail.

section.entry: Please write to %1 if you would like to mail a cheque or send money by mail.
